title: How to Make a Rhubarb and Strawberry Jam with Ginger

steps.headline: Peel the rhubarbs (if necessary - not always needed).
Cut the rhubarbs into 2 cm (1/2 inch) length stripes.
Put rhubarb, strawberries, lemon peels, sugar and water into a pot and mix well.
Bring to boil when mixing and boil for another 5 minutes.
Take the pot off the stove and remove any excess foam from the jam.
Take the jam-jar and scald it with boiling water.
Pour the jam into the warm jam-jar and close tightly.

text: Peel the rhubarbs (if necessary - not always needed).  Wash the strawberries.  Cut the rhubarbs into 2 cm (1/2 inch) length stripes.  Cut strawberries into half.  Put rhubarb, strawberries, lemon peels, sugar and water into a pot and mix well.  Bring to boil when mixing and boil for another 5 minutes.  Take the pot off the stove and remove any excess foam from the jam.  Mix the ginger in.  Take the jam-jar and scald it with boiling water.  Pour the jam into the warm jam-jar and close tightly.
